name: TVCaptionButtonViewMotionDirection
desc: The directions that the caption button view can tilt in response to user interactions on the remote.

items.name: case all
items.desc: The caption button view can tilt in all directions.

items.name: case horizontal
items.desc: The caption button view can tilt in the horzontal direction.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The caption button view can't tilt.

items.name: case vertical
items.desc: The caption button view can tilt in the vertical direction.
